name: Devas Tower Defense
description:
Hi there! 

I'm Victor and this project is my first attempt at becoming a game developer!

I have been a fan of tower defense games for as long as I can remember. I have played through all kinds such as Desktop Tower Defense, Element TD (Warcraft 3 mod) and, of course, Kingdom Rush.

My initial idea with this game was to crash course myself into game development with Unity and since I really wanted to make a TD game I ended up buying some visual assets to make this project come true.

This game (Version 1.6 at the time) was developed under a month and I'm pretty happy with the result, and because of that I decided to share it. I've been able to test it a few times (with some help from some friends) and fix a few major problems, but if you find any other issues don't hesitate to contact me! Feel free to leave some feedback too, I'd greatly appreciate!

Special thanks to iwanPlays, Nakhas, Cyberios, Lydmakeren, qubodup, Hanbaal, Erdie, DominikBraun, spring, otto-halmén and Michel Baradari for their free sound assets.

Art by Craftpix

Developer: Victor Régis

TO DO list:

- Implement better UI (I already have the UI elements, just need to figure out a nice way to display them)

- Create more levels (takes some time, but I believe I'm going to release at least two more maps)

- Add more enemy variety (I wanted to implement special enemies, but they demand a lot of work for little improvement in the game overall)
